item.title: @elonmusk: New babies are impossibly tiny and only this tiny (hand for scale) for a few weeks. Then they get bi...
item.description: New babies are impossibly tiny and only this tiny (hand for scale) for a few weeks. Then they get big and start having opinions. This is number four, very fresh and highly perfect. All credit due of course to my brilliant and beautiful wife. Babies get much easier with practice. It's a shame we don't get to do fish-levels reps. I haven't yet seen an LLM do this.

item.title: @elonmusk: üá∫üá∏ Epstein Files: Bannon Thanked Epstein for ‚ÄúTerrific Day,‚Äù Pitches More ‚ÄúFun Things" Bannon discus...
item.description: üá∫üá∏ Epstein Files: Bannon Thanked Epstein for ‚ÄúTerrific Day,‚Äù Pitches More ‚ÄúFun Things" Bannon discussing meetings that need "academic settings for cover" and offering his compound behind the Supreme Court as "a great base." Then sharing Saudi missile footage. Response: "Yep---6" What the hell is this conversation? "Joi" is likely Joi Ito, the MIT Media Lab director who resigned over his Epstein ties. What exactly was being planned here?

item.title: @elonmusk: üá∫üá∏ DOJ UNREDACTS LES WEXNER AS CO-CONSPIRATOR IN EPSTEIN SEX TRAFFICKING AFTER MASSIE PRESSURE This ...
item.description: üá∫üá∏ DOJ UNREDACTS LES WEXNER AS CO-CONSPIRATOR IN EPSTEIN SEX TRAFFICKING AFTER MASSIE PRESSURE This is huge. The DOJ just unredacted an FBI file labeling Les Wexner as a co-conspirator in child sex trafficking. This directly contradicts congressional testimony claiming the FBI held no evidence of additional traffickers. The DOJ originally justified heavy redactions by citing victim protection. Tonight proved you can protect victim identities while still disclosing the names of alleged perpetrators. The dam is breaking. Hopefully, more names will be released in the coming days. Source:@RepThomasMassie

item.title: @elonmusk: I don't understand how we're not having a global revolution right now. There are 3 million files of ...
item.description: I don't understand how we're not having a global revolution right now. There are 3 million files of documented evidence about powerful men who Raped Cannibalized Trafficked Filmed Terrorized Tortured Murdered 13, 14, 15 year children! And Zero arrests.
